Question: In 1928, this person and Glenn Miller wrote the instrumental "Room 1411", which was released as a Brunswick 78.
Hints: This person and Krupa played in a trio with Teddy Wilson on piano.
This person was regarded by some as a demanding taskmaster, by others an arrogant and eccentric martinet.
In 1953 they had another falling-out during this person's ill-fated tour with Louis Armstrong, which was produced by John Hammond.
